transcript: And you'll always have that and you should feel, you know, happy for him that he got to do so much before. You know, even after he found out last year, I mean...

You know, even after he found out last year, I mean...

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And you'll always have that and--you should feel, you know, happy for him that he got to do so much before--I mean, and even after he found out last year.  I mean--
